content.rendered:
Directed by Behzad Khambata

Written by Behzad Khambata. Ashley Lobo. Vijay Maurya

Star Yami Gautam (Naina Jaiswal). Atul Kulkarni (Javed Khan). Neha Dhupia (ACP Catherine Alvarez). Dimple Kapadia (Prime Minister Maya Rajguru). Kalyanee Mulay (Savitri). Karanvir Sharma (Rohit Mirchandani). Maya Sarao (Shalini Guha). Boloram Das (Govekar). Sukesh Anand (Lokhande). Adi Irani (Police Commissioner). Shubhangi Latkar (Kusum Jaiswal). Divjyot Kaur (Renuka Dubey). Micky Makhija (Rohit’s Father). Sanjeev Jogtiyani (Malcolm). Sulagna Chatterjee (Aakash’s Mom). Bhavin Hirani (Aakash’s Dad). Asim Sharma (PM PR Rep). Shailendra Gaur (PM Secretary). Raj Sharma (Home minister). Dinesh Kaushik (NSA Head). Zidane Braz (Yash). Hardika Sharma (Niharika). Yug Pandya (Aakash). Dia Jain (Dia). Kaizan Khambatta (Kaizan). Keva Gala (Keva). Arif Zakaria (Aria). Trisha Bisht (Trisha). Aishleen Ratan (Dhooni). Kavya Shivhare (Kavya). Saransh Jaisinghani (Saransh). Hanishka Masani (Hanishka). Abeer Jain (Abeer). Ahaan Saboo (Janosh). Kunal Parwani (Janosh’s Dad). Mamta Solanki (Kavya’s Mom). Shruti Pandey (Shalini’s PA). Unnati Gala (Tech Operator 1). Dheeraj Narang (Tech Operator 2 (credit only)). Neer Raao (Akbar). Kamaldeep Singh Mahun (Tactical Team Captain). Azim Naqvi (PNBC Male News Anchor). Aakansha Kadre (Aakanksha Kadre). Mazel Vyas (Young Naina). Rita Kaul (Ms. Joshi). Digvijay Savant (Mr. Kumar). Jehangir Karkaria (Mr. Goyal). Akram Aziz (Rakesh Mathur). Ankit Sharma (PNBC Male Ground Reporter). Nimisha Nair (PNBC Female Ground Reporter). Prachi Hada (Playschool Ground Reporter 1). Saksham Vashisht (Playschool Ground Reporter 2). Nishant Bansal (Playschool Ground Reporter 3). Nirmal Raghav (Hotel Ground Reporter 1). Manisha Arora (Hotel Ground Reporter 2). Amrendra Kumar (Hotel Ground Reporter 3). Anuja Walhe (Substitute Teacher Barkha). Ayushi Nema (News Anchor). Sakshi Singh (News Anchor). Rajeev Singh (News Anchor). Shadab (News anchor). Dinesh Rikame (Vipassana Cop). Gagan Gupta (Vipassana Head Cop). Kalpana Rao (Doctor Juneja). Nimesh Balaji Shinde (Building Watchman). Saurabh Arora (Drama School Teacher). Megh Patil (Drama School Student). Ramprasad Tripathi (NSG Commando)

Language Hindi

Producers Hasanain Hooda. Pashan Jal. Salona Bains Joshi. Sonia Kanwar. Lovekush Kumar. Ashley Lobo. Premnath Rajagopalan. Mabel Rajgopalan. Abhineet Singh Rajput. Nikhil Saini. Ronnie Screwvala. Maharsh Shah. Rohit Jaising Vaid. Sanaya Irani Zohrabi

Production Blue Monkey Films. RSVP. RSVPMovies
